tickets.qrCodeDescription: Show this QR code at the venue entrance for quick access
tickets.autoRedirect: Redirecting to face verification in {{seconds}} seconds...
tickets.noActiveTicketsDesc: You don't have any active tickets at the moment.

transfer.title: Transfer Ticket
transfer.confirmMessage: User found. Are you sure? This step cannot be reverted.
transfer.successMessage: Ticket successfully transferred. A confirmation email has been sent to the user.
transfer.notFoundMessage: The email address you entered is not registered in our system. Please check the email and try again.

success.title: Verification Complete!
success.subtitle: Your identity has been verified successfully
success.readyMessage: Your ticket is now redeemed and you are ready to enter the concert

faceScanning.entrySubtitle: Verify your identity to redeem your ticket and enter the venue
faceScanning.entryNotice: Scanning your face to verify your ticket for venue entry
